text: ( Source : City of Pittsburgh , PA) PITTSBURGH, PA ( October 12 , 2015 ) - The Office of Mayor William Peduto and City of Pittsburgh Department of Public Works will hold a press conference on Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015 at 11:30 a.m. to discuss
